content.rendered:
Bridge Careers Travel Agencies will be hosting an appreciation event honoring our past and current employees in celebration of the 2016 ASA National Staffing Employee Week held September 19 – September 25. Past and current employees of Bridge Careers Travel Agencies are invited to come to our office on September 22, 2016 for snacks, an appreciation gift, picture taking with our mascot and owners of the company and for the drawing of the Certificate of Excellence award. When:    September 22, 2016 Where:  Bridge Careers Travel Agencies

5416 S Yale Ave., Suite 310

Tulsa, OK 74135

918-622-2588

Times:   11:00 am – 12:45 pm: Snacks, gift and picture taking

12:45 pm – 1:00 pm: Drawing for Certificate of Excellence winner

  Certificate of Excellence Award We have asked our clients to nominate a past or current employee who exemplifies being an outstanding professional.  Of these nominations, one winner will be selected to receive the Certificate of Excellence and grand prize. All nominees will receive a special gift acknowledging their nomination.
